name: Echoes that Sing
description:
Brought to you by the team who brought you Homeward Bound and Moonward Bound as well as Look Out! We are improving as much as ever with out latest game where we collab with some new folks!

--

Echoes that Sings takes place in a fictional Los Angeles, Las Rosa, where you follow the story of a young man name Adam who still mourns over the loss of his father. Life at home isn't what he thought it would be so with his new taught skills he decided to take life to his own hand.

--

Our first game established as a full fledged team, mockinbird.dev

Thank you guys for playing! Our first ever visual novel for Nanoren 2022! Created using Ren'py. Our first time learning Python and using this wonderful engine!

mockinbird.dev NaNoRenO 2022 team:

  • Mendoxe - Coder
  • Sawada14 - Coder
  • DJKNITEX - Writer
  • MeiYS - Additional Artist
  • Jenna - Character Artist
  • oozy_q - Music

Asset credits: Uncle Mugen (ren'py forums), tofurocks, freepik, freesound.org, fesliyanstudios.com, and pixabay.com

https://mockinbird.dev
